role_reactions.config_start:
🎯 **Role Reaction Configuration Started**

I'll help you set up role reactions step by step.

**Instructions:**
• Reply to each prompt with the requested information
• Type 'stop' at any time to cancel
• You can configure multiple message/emoji/role combinations
role_reactions.enter_message:
📝 **Step 1:** Send the message ID where you want to add role reactions.

**How to get message ID:**
1. Enable Developer Mode in Discord settings
2. Right-click on the message
3. Select 'Copy ID'
4. Paste the ID here

**Or type 'stop' to cancel**
role_reactions.enter_emoji:
😀 **Step 2:** Send the emoji you want to use for the role reaction.

**Examples:**
• 🎮 (Unicode emoji)
• <:custom:123456789> (Custom emoji)

**Or type 'stop' to cancel**
role_reactions.mention_role:
🎭 **Step 3:** Mention the role that should be assigned when users react.

**Examples:**
• @Gaming
• @Members
• Just type the role name

**Or type 'stop' to cancel**
role_reactions.role_not_found:
❌ **Role not found:** `{role}`

Please check the role name and try again, or mention the role directly.
role_reactions.config_complete:
✅ **Role reaction configuration completed!**

**Summary:**
• Message configured with role reactions
• Users can now react to get roles automatically
• Reactions are monitored and roles will be assigned/removed

command.description: Configure role reactions with simple message interface

main_menu.title: ⚡ Role Reactions Management
main_menu.description: Configure automatic role assignment through message reactions. Use the buttons below to manage your role reactions.

create_new.title: 📝 Create Role Reaction Message
create_new.step1_description:
**Step 1:** Reply to this message with the title and description for your role reaction message.

**Format:**
```
Title: Your Title Here
Description: Your description here
```

**Example:**
```
Title: Get Your Roles!
Description: Click the reactions below to get your roles
```
create_new.step2_description:
**Step 2:** Add reactions one by one using this format:
```
Emoji: 🎮
Role: @Gaming
```

Or:
```
Emoji: 🎨
Role: Artist
```

**Type 'done' when finished adding all reactions.**
create_new.format_error: ❌ Please provide a title using the format: `Title: Your Title Here`
create_new.role_not_found: ❌ Role '{role}' not found. Please check the role name or mention.
create_new.format_instructions:
❌ Please use the format:
```
Emoji: 🎮
Role: @Gaming
```
create_new.success: ✅ Role reaction message created with {count} reactions!

edit_existing.title: 📝 Existing Role Reaction Messages
edit_existing.description: Select a message to edit its reactions:
edit_existing.message_description:
Message ID: {message_id}
Choose what you'd like to do:
edit_existing.add_reaction_description:
Add a new reaction to this message using this format:
```
Emoji: 🎮
Role: @Gaming
```

Reply with the emoji and role information.
edit_existing.remove_reactions: Select the reactions you want to remove:
edit_existing.remove_all_success: ✅ All reactions removed from the message!

view_all.title: 📊 All Role Reaction Configurations
view_all.description: Here are all your configured role reactions:

config_system.description: Unified configuration for all bot systems
config_system.no_permission: ❌ You must be an administrator to use this command.
config_system.title: ⚙️ Bot Configuration
config_system.description_text: Select the system you want to configure from the dropdown menu below.
config_system.systems_list:
👋 **Welcome System** - Welcome and goodbye messages
💬 **Confession System** - Channel for anonymous confessions
🎭 **Role Requests** - Channel for role requests
⚡ **Role Reactions** - Automatic role assignment
📊 **XP System** - Experience and level system
🎫 **Ticket System** - Support and tickets
🌍 **Language** - Server language

role_reactions.interactive_warning:
💡 **Use the `/rolereact` command for full management**

The improved `/rolereact` command provides:
• Modern interface with buttons and menus
• Create new role reaction messages
• Edit existing messages and reactions
• Remove individual reactions or entire messages
• View all configurations

Simply use `/rolereact` to access all role reaction features!
